overview: Not quite as you remember them, beloved bedtime stories of old have been brought back but no longer sweet and watered down. These are tales of sex and sin, passion, perversion, and of desire and debauchery. Join Wicked Pictures and award winning director Brad Armstrong as they bring you the next chapter in their erotic fairy tale anthology with stories your mother never told you...
tagline: An erotic fairy tale anthology with stories your mother never told you...
title: The Craving II
